languages.text: {n}Блаженные не пытались защитить себя или как-то противиться свершенному над ними насилию. Они приняли смерть так же, как и явились на этот свет — тихо и покорно. Народные волнения утихли, а великое ваяние продолжилось, но без Блаженных темпы освоения плодородных земель заметно снизились.{/n}

{n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Блаженные не пытались защитить себя или как-то противиться свершенному над ними насилию. Они приняли смерть так же, как и явились на этот свет — тихо и покорно. Народные волнения утихли, а великое ваяние продолжилось, но без Блаженных темпы освоения плодородных земель заметно снизились.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Blessed did not try to defend themselves or to resist the abuse in any way. They have accepted death in the same way as they did life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens had died down, and the great sculpting continued as before, but the rates of the development of fertile land have declined noticeably without the Blessed.{/n}

{n}The Blessed did not try to defend themselves or to resist the abuse in any way. They have accepted death in the same way as they did life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens had died down, and the great sculpting continued as before, but the rates of the development of fertile land have declined noticeably without the Blessed.{/n}

The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受召者并没有试图保护自己，也没有以任何方式进行反抗。他们安静而顺从地接受了死亡，正如他们活着的时候所表现的那样。民众之中的动乱平息下来，伟大塑造仍旧像以前一样继续推进，但失去了受召者之后，富饶土地的开发进度明显变慢了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受召者并没有试图保护自己，也没有以任何方式进行反抗。他们安静而顺从地接受了死亡，正如他们活着的时候所表现的那样。民众之中的动乱平息下来，伟大塑造仍旧像以前一样继续推进，但失去了受召者之后，富饶土地的开发进度明显变慢了。{/n}
{n}受召者并没有试图保护自己，也没有以任何方式进行反抗。他们安静而顺从地接受了死亡，正如他们活着的时候所表现的那样。民众之中的动乱平息下来，伟大塑造仍旧像以前一样继续推进，但富饶土地的开发速度明显减慢了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Tocados no intentaron defenderse ni oponer resistencia alguna. Aceptaron la muerte del mismo modo que vivieron la vida: en silencio y obedientemente. El malestar entre los ciudadanos se ha calmado, y la gran escultura ha continuado como antes, pero el desarrollo de tierra fértil ha disminuido notablemente sin los Tocados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Tocados no intentaron defenderse ni oponer resistencia alguna. Aceptaron la muerte del mismo modo que vivieron la vida: en silencio y obedientemente. El malestar entre los ciudadanos se ha calmado, y la gran escultura ha continuado como antes, pero el desarrollo de tierra fértil ha disminuido notablemente sin los Tocados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}触れられし者たちは、自らを守ろうともせず、抵抗しようともしなかった。彼らは生を全うしたのと同じようにただ静かに、従順に...死を受け入れた。民の不安は収まらず、偉大なる彫刻は以前と同じように継続しているものの、触れられし者のいない状態では、肥沃な土地の開発速度は著しく低下していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}触れられし者たちは、自らを守ろうともせず、抵抗しようともしなかった。彼らは生を全うしたのと同じようにただ静かに、従順に...死を受け入れた。民の不安は収まらず、偉大なる彫刻は以前と同じように継続しているものの、触れられし者のいない状態では、肥沃な土地の開発速度は著しく低下していた。{/n}
{n}触れられし者たちは、自らを守ろうともせず、抵抗しようともしなかった。彼らは生を全うしたのと同じようにただ静かに、従順に...死を受け入れた。民の不安は収まらず、偉大なる彫刻は以前と同じように継続しているものの、触れられし者のいない状態では、肥沃な土地の開発速度は著しく低下していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Altérés ne songent pas un seul instant à se défendre ou à résister. Ils acceptent la mort comme ils ont toujours vécu : sans un mot et avec une obéissance aveugle. L'agitation parmi les citoyens retombe et le grand œuvre reprend son cours, mais sans les Altérés, le développement des terres fertiles connaît une perte de vitesse considérable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Altérés ne songent pas un seul instant à se défendre ou à résister. Ils acceptent la mort comme ils ont toujours vécu : sans un mot et avec une obéissance aveugle. L'agitation parmi les citoyens retombe et le grand œuvre reprend son cours, mais sans les Altérés, le développement des terres fertiles connaît une perte de vitesse considérable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Berührten versuchten nicht, sich zu verteidigen oder sich in irgendeiner Art und Weise zur Wehr zu setzen. Sie haben den Tod auf dieselbe Weise akzeptiert wie sie ihr Leben gelebt haben ... still und gehorsam. Die Unruhe unter den Bürgern hat sich gelegt und die große Formgebung wurde fortgeführt. Ohne die Berührten hat sich die Schaffung von fruchtbarem Land allerdings deutlich verlangsamt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Berührten versuchten nicht, sich zu verteidigen oder sich in irgendeiner Art und Weise zur Wehr zu setzen. Sie haben den Tod auf dieselbe Weise akzeptiert wie sie ihr Leben gelebt haben ... still und gehorsam. Die Unruhe unter den Bürgern hat sich gelegt und die große Formgebung wurde fortgeführt. Ohne die Berührten hat sich die Schaffung von fruchtbarem Land allerdings deutlich verlangsamt.{/n}

{n}Die Berührten versuchten nicht, sich zu verteidigen oder sich in irgendeiner Art und Weise zur Wehr zu setzen. Sie haben den Tod auf dieselbe Weise akzeptiert wie sie ihr Leben gelebt haben — still und gehorsam. Die Unruhe unter den Bürgern hat sich gelegt und die große Formgebung wurde fortgeführt. Ohne die Berührten wurde das fruchtbare Land also deutlich weniger effizient genutzt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mütehassisler, ne kendilerini savunmaya ne de direnmeye kalkıştı. Hayatlarını nasıl sessizce ve itaatkârca yaşadılarsa ölümü de öyle kabullendiler. Yurttaşlar arasındaki huzursuzluk yatıştırıldı, yüce şekillendirmeye eskisi gibi devam ediliyor. Ancak Mütehassislerin gidişiyle birlikte bereketli topraklardaki üretim, gözle görülür bir şekilde düştü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Touched did not try to defend themselves or to resist in any way. They accepted death in much the same way they lived life — quietly and obediently. The unrest among the citizens has simmered down, and the great sculpting continues as before, but the development of fertile land has noticeably slowed without the Touched.{/n}
